main event: A bright light was observed at high altitude, flashing at irregular intervals on July 2, 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2-3 minutes,The object was described as a steady bright light very high in altitude,The sound or physical evidence was not reported,Definite identification of the object was not established,The report originates from Project Blue Book, which investigated UFOs.
sighted object: steady bright light high in the sky
witness description: Flight controller and tower personnel at Shaw AFB
